casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David FELTON 54P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 7, 2017 David Felton, for Felton, David. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*702The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of April 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeals:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of April 2017."
